title: Hear from Lazuli Solutions at Operational Modelling for PFI Finance Projects Masterclass 2015
text:
Hear from Lazuli Solutions at Operational Modelling for PFI Finance Projects Masterclass 2015
SMis upcoming masterclass entitled: Operational Modelling for PFI Finance Projects will take place on the 9th December 2015 in Central London, UK.
London, United Kingdom, September 09, 2015 --( PR.com )-- The Operational Modelling for PFI Finance Projects Masterclass provides an unmissable opportunity to learn from an industry-leading expert and witness the key issues in building and using an operational model for a PFI/PPP project. Delegates will experience first-hand how to update an operating model and produce reports for key stakeholders such as directors or lenders.
The masterclass will be hosted by Dominic Robertson, Owner and Director of Lazuli Solutions, and will be taking place on the 9th December 2015 in London, UK. Lazuli Solutions has been building and auditing financial models since the mid-nineties. To this date, it has worked on nearly 10% of project models in the UK PFI market, specializing in the construction of user-friendly operating model solutions.
Benefits of Attending in 2015:
· To learn key tips to dealing with operational PFI models
· To increase your confidence in dealing with PFI models in general
· To learn some very useful ways of reporting on your analysis of PFI models, particularly operational models
· To have a framework for understanding and dealing with large PFI operational models in order to investigate further and better
· To learn some key Excel modelling tips
Those who are interested in attending are advised to register before the 30th September and benefit from the £100 early bird discount.
For more information on the event or to register, please visit www.smi-online.co.uk/2015operational-financial-models3.asp
Alternatively, contact Andre Brown at +44 (0) 20 7827 6058 or abrown@smi-online.co.uk
About SMi Group:
Established since 1993, the SMi Group is a global event-production company that specializes in Business-to-Business Conferences, Workshops, Masterclasses and online Communities. We create and deliver events in the Defence, Security, Energy, Utilities, Finance and Pharmaceutical industries. We pride ourselves on having access to the world’s most forward thinking opinion leaders and visionaries, allowing us to bring our communities together to Learn, Engage, Share and Network. More information can be found at http://www.smi-online.co.uk.
